description.value: You have a nearly encyclopedic knowledge of all creatures of the world. You can use Nature to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Recall Knowledge] to identify any creature. In addition, you gain the benefits of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Monster Hunter] (and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Monster Warden], if you have it) on a success as well as a critical success.
